goals.title: Goals and Practice Count
goals.description: Aim to practice reading aloud 10 times a day. We recommend reading each phrase aloud at least 50 times. Through consistent and repetitive practice, phrases will naturally come out of your mouth.

progress.title: Phrases you couldn't say - you think you should review them but end up leaving them untouched

feature1.title: AI instantly generates "phrases you couldn't say"
feature1.description: AI translates phrases you couldn't express into natural expressions. Since it's based on phrases you actually couldn't say, more practical learning is possible.

demo.input: How long have you been living in Japan?
outputs: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
日本に住んで何年になりますか？
日本にいらしてどのくらいになりますか？

feature2.title:
Reading count feature for
thorough support "until you can speak"
feature2.description: Simply "knowing" a language isn't enough to speak it. Aim for 10 readings per day and a total of 50 readings per phrase until it comes out naturally from your mouth.

demo.input: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
demo.output: How long have you been living in Japan?

feature3.title:
Check your "quick response"
with quiz features
feature3.description: Can phrases memorized through reading practice actually be used in real conversations? Use the quiz feature to instantly respond with memorized phrases, completing the memory → repetition → practice cycle.

demo.input: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
demo.output: How long have you been living in Japan?

q1.question: Is there a limit to phrase generation?
q1.answer: You can use it up to 5 times per day.
q1.answerDetail: Let's steadily build up 5 phrases every day.

q2.question: When does the phrase generation count reset?
q2.answer: It resets at 0:00 UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).
q2.answerDetail: In Japan Standard Time, it resets at 9:00 AM (winter time) or 8:00 AM (summer time).

q3.question: Is Solo Speak free to use?
q3.answer: Basic features are currently available for free.
q3.answerDetail: We may introduce paid features in the future as we expand our services, but we will notify you in advance.
